mapper.select: SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.topic, A.is_locked, A.is_delete, A.password, A.max_participant, A.current_participant, A.owner_seq, A.created_at, IF(A.current_participant = A.max_participant, true, false) as is_full, B.nickname, B.photo FROM rooms A inner join users B on A.owner_seq = B.seq WHERE A.is_delete = false ORDER BY A.created_at DESC

SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.topic, A.is_locked, A.is_delete, A.password, A.max_participant, A.current_participant, A.owner_seq, A.created_at, IF(A.current_participant = A.max_participant, true, false) as is_full, B.nickname, B.photo FROM rooms A inner join users B on A.owner_seq = B.seq WHERE A.is_delete = false AND A.SEQ = ${seq}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO rooms( title, topic, is_locked, is_delete, password, max_participant, current_participant, owner_seq, created_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{topic}, ${isLocked}, 0, #{password}, #{maxParticipant}, 0, ${ownerSeq}, now() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
